page.title: 03CLOTHES WE WEAR
page.content: Most people like fashion. Everybody has a different taste of clothes. I am going to tell you about the things people wear in our area. A man usually wears a shirt, jumper, trousers, belt, socks and shoes or boots. A lady wears a dress, skirt, blouse, jumper, cardigan, necklaces and shoes. Children are much the same. Boys wear jeans, shorts, T-shirt, jacket, socks, trainers or shoes. Girls wear dresses, skirts, jumpers, cardigans, blouses, T-shirts, shorts trainers or shoes. Some people at school wear a school uniform which for girls is skirt, blouse, tie, cardigan, jumper, socks, trainers or shoes. We all like different clothes. What will we be wearing in 900 years? We'll just have to wait and see.
